name: mshasha-photography
description: Mshasha Zwinepe Photography Full Stack App

scripts.build: cd MshashaZwinepe && npm install && npm run build
scripts.start: cd Backend && npm install && npm start
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd MshashaZwinepe && npm run dev" "cd Backend && npm run dev"
scripts.postinstall: cd MshashaZwinepe && npm install && cd ../Backend && npm install
